chapters.title: Chapter 48: A Brilliant LanceChapter 49: Light and ShadowEpilogue: To See the Answer
chapters.info: Shanan, p. 900—Sul'dam who captures Moghedien. She does not know that she holds one of the Forsaken, only that her new charge is not Aes Sedai or a Wise One, and thus not subject to the treaty the Seanchan signed with the other nations.
